reviews.review: Not one for "horror" games, but this one was great fun. I highly recommend. Takes a minute to get used to, but otherwise I recommend.

Definitely not "new player" friendly, but a vastly diverse game that can keep you entertained for hours and hours and hours. There have been attempts to take the heat away from the game, i.e. Friday the 13th and things of that nature, but you can't dethrone the king. 

If you're in the mood for an asymmetrical horror slasher, this is definitely up your alley. Definitely not a game for the easily deterred.

Constantly getting new characters in the game, patches and overall a very well looked after game. A must get for fans of the genre.
me gusta lo divertido son las persecuciones si vas a jugar a reparar y esconderte  mejor juega gay fire o forgay
The kids ain't coming out the basement

Great game. Make u feel thrilled and pump ur adrenaline. Fun if u wanna play as a survivor or killer.
Overall : Recommend

Es un buen juego divertido y entretenido pero deje de jugarlo por la comunidad que tiene, que es muy toxica. Voy a jugarlo de nuevo por que el juego me gustaba, a ver si no lo dejo por el mismo motivo. Recomiendo pillarlo cuando este en oferta, lo ponen varias veces en oferta.

Como amante de los video juegos aseguro que es de lo mejor que vi, es una joya y los desarrolladores estan siempre innovando y trabajando en contenido y en los killers  y supervivientes, nada malo que ver mucho positivo que aportar.

I've played this game for a long time, in it's infancy and even now as killers/survivors/maps are being developed and released today. I cannot recommend this game. 


Now don't get me wrong, it's a fun game... sometimes. More often than not, the game and its players are irritating and rage inducing. Play a survivor and you'll be trolled, tunneled, or camped by a Killer. Play killer and survivors will taunt you, harrass you, troll you, etc. It quickly becomes old and more irritating than it's worth honestly. 


Save your money and just enjoy watching streamers/broadcasters play this game because it's not worth playing. At least, if you value your sanity at all.



Additionally, I've never had a game crash or experience errors as often as this one done. 

NO BUGS ONLY FEATURES
Its very fun to run from the killer or be the killer himself. By the end of a match, I can say there are no losers. Its fun for both parties.

Con mis menos de 15h ya estoy empezando a dominar el arte del trolleo supremo a los killers, te pillas al personaje basico del juego (Claudette) para correr con ropa super llamativa, te miras tus ricos video tutoriales de como ser sonic fusionado con la chica del mirror's edge y listo.
Buen juego, ahora mejor que lo optimizaron pero les falta aun.

Thoroughly enjoy the format of the game. It's much less horror and more competitive than I expected. There are certain killers with jump scare elements to them, but otherwise it's a competitive game in a horror theme, which is still fantastic. Community can sometimes be toxic, but devs work hard to punish/eliminate trolling.

Dead By Daylight is a very fun game where you are escaping from killers as a survivor (or playing as the killer). To me it is really cool to be able to become or escape from killers and survivors from horror movies of my childhood and to feel like I am actually put in their situations. The developers are constantly creating updates to make the game more fair and balanced and to make it so there is somewhat of a meta game. This has made this game even more fun for me because it is constantly changing and become more dynamic. Definitely worth the price of the game and the DLC are really good deals if you want to have a different play style or just play someone from movies or games you love. I will be playing this game for a long time.

Edit: The only true statement in this review at this point is that I've been playing this game for a long time.
Tolles Spiel, manchmal nervig, manchmal lustig. werde es weiterhin spielen.
DBD is fun to play, still has it's little issues that could be fixed but loads of people come back to play this game no matter what.

Es un juego dentro de todo bueno, entretendio y para jugar con amigos esta de 10, lo malo que le veo es que tiene muchos bugs y la optimizacion no es de la mejor, mi pc no es tan buena como para correr esto al maximo sin duda cambiando algunos archivos lo logre hacer correr a unos fps aceptables, lo que yo opino que deberian hacer es que dejen de meter tanto cosmetico y mejor el juego en tema optimizacion y relacionado, pienso que si el juego llegara a ser mejor en el sentido de optimizacion calidad etc, va a ser mas popular de lo que ya es. Y lo recomiendo de todos modos a pesar de los problemas que comete :D
The game is fun yet challenging. For the survivors it requires teamwork and communication. For the killer it requires perception and situation awareness. Overall a great experience

If you happen to purchase this game when it isn't +/- 3 days from the 13th of the month, Do yourself a favor: refund and move on. 

This seems like a fun game, but has one glaring issue: diminishing playerbase is causing queues for those that want to play as the "Killer" to take 30m+ if you haven't already played quite a bit that month. This is a CRIPPLING issue for a game that already has a low playerbase, meaning if you don't care for playing survivor, or just want to spend a round feeling like Jason or Freddy, be prepared for the long haul.

Apparently, this issue is remedied if you play consistently from the 13th of a given month, when the ranking resets. Knowing this, I probably wouldn't have bought the game at the time I did, opting instead to wait until next month.

Gameplay seems OK, but it's hard to judge when you play only half the experience because you can't play the other half even if you want to.

All that being said, I give this game a hard 3, maybe a soft 4. Overall, Hard Pass.
